15.name: SuperNova Xtreme Gaming Laptop
15.description: High-performance gaming laptop with RTX 4080, 32GB RAM, and 1TB SSD. Perfect for demanding games and creative work.

16.name: ProShot 4K Digital Camera
16.description: Mirrorless digital camera with 24MP sensor, 4K video, and advanced autofocus. Ideal for professional photography and videography.

17.name: CleanBot Smart Robot Vacuum
17.description: Automated vacuum cleaner with intelligent mapping, powerful suction, and app control. Keeps your floors spotless effortlessly.

18.name: UrbanExplorer Laptop Backpack
18.description: Durable and water-resistant backpack with dedicated laptop compartment (up to 15-inch), multiple pockets, and padded straps. Perfect for daily commute.

19.name: Radiant Glow Skincare Kit
19.description: Complete skincare routine for glowing skin, includes cleanser, serum, moisturizer, and night cream. Suitable for all skin types.

20.name: Strategy Quest Board Game
20.description: Engaging strategy board game for 2-4 players. Build your empire, explore new lands, and conquer your rivals. Ages 10+.

21.name: SpeedVault 1TB Portable SSD
21.description: Ultra-fast 1TB external Solid State Drive with USB-C connectivity. Ideal for quick data transfers and gaming on the go.

22.name: HydrateNow Insulated Water Bottle
22.description: Stainless steel, double-walled insulated water bottle. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours. 750ml capacity.

23.name: Gourmet Adventures Cookbook
23.description: Collection of international recipes from renowned chefs. Features step-by-step instructions and beautiful photography. Perfect for home cooks.

24.name: LumiSmart Color Changing Bulb
24.description: Wi-Fi enabled smart LED light bulb with millions of colors and tunable white light. Control via app or voice assistants (Alexa, Google Home).

25.name: SparkleClean Sonic Toothbrush
25.description: Rechargeable electric toothbrush with sonic vibrations, 3 cleaning modes, and 2-minute timer. Provides superior plaque removal.
